# iTIME <img src="figures/hex.png" align="right" height="139" />

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

iTIME (interactive Tumor Immune MicroEnvironment) is a `shiny` application that creates interactive figures for examining spatial organization of individual tumors and provide basic spatial and summary information. This project was initiated as part of the [Moffitt Biodata Club](https://www.biodataclub.org/) 2020 Hackathon.
